messages.subject: This American Life: Scary Parents
messages.msgSnippet: Just in case you didn t get enough traditional parenting: the one I was really upset by is the very last segment- a defense of parents screaming and cursing at
messages.messageBody:
Just in case you didn't get enough traditional parenting: the one I was
really upset by is the very last segment- a defense of parents screaming
and cursing at their children.

Heather


http://www.thislife.org/Radio_Episode.aspx?sched=1209

It is the October 5th 2007show, "How to Talk to Kids"

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Tooth Fairy funny
messages.msgSnippet: LOL! Alex Wildflower Car  wrote: As I have mentioned before, we pretend like there is a tooth fairy, but everyone in my house know
messages.messageBody:
LOL!
Alex

Wildflower Car <unschoolfool@...> wrote:

As I have mentioned before, we pretend like there is a tooth fairy, but everyone in my house know it's just a game for us.

My 9 year old lost a tooth this week and we had this conversation;

DD, "Is the tooth fairy going to come visit?"
Me, "I don't know, do you want the tooth fairy to come?"
DD, "Well, I would rather the tooth fairy just take me to the dollar store to buy something."

So off we went to the dollar store!

Wildflower
